name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
categoryPath: Movies & TV/TV Shows/Anime & Animation/Anime for Children

reviews.name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Digimon Season 1 is among the best in animated cartoon series. For those with an inclination toward science fiction and quality characterization, Digimon won't disappoint. I still find honesty and value in its presentation of the story and I'm now in my mid-twenties. Walmart's price is exceptionally reasonable, so grab it if you can! There are a few small quality issues with the product (line shadowing on the screen in a few episodes; some mix-ups in the printed booklet accompanying the discs). However, this detracts very little. Highly recommended for your collecton and viewing pleasure!
reviews.title: Great series, great deal

reviews.name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this DVD when it was half of what it would normally cost. I was going to get it for Xmas but I decided to go ahead and buy it now. The video and audio quality is great and there seems to be no problems with it. For 8 disks and 54 episodes this is not a bad deal at all. It helped me remember a time when things were simpler and my only concern was what would Angemon's digivolution look like. The only thing I wish it had was more bonus features.
reviews.title: Youth nostalgia

reviews.name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText:
All 52 episodes with the original company's logo at the end of each episode.
It really brings back memories!

However,
there's only one SMALL thing wrong with it.
Some of the character data in the booklet is wrong.
It's not that big of a deal.
reviews.title: Great collectors item

reviews.name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Includes the entire First series from entering the Digiworld all the way through the Dark Masters. The video and audio are great for a show that came out in the pre-HD era. THe only downside to this set is that there is no option for the Japanese audio or subtitles.
reviews.title: Great Set.

reviews.name: Digimon: Digital Monsters - The Offical First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the video on the dvds are excelent! The only couple of things I found wrong with the packaging was first there was a gramar error in the booklet and then the cd case doesnt stay closed very well!
reviews.title: 24 October 2012
